item.title: Guy Dupuy STUNS UF crowd of 11,000 with the PERFECT DUNK with EASE | Dunk of the Day #SCTOP10
item.description:
Comment and Share for a chance to WIN 100$ Worth of Free Team Flight Brothers gear for Christmas!
Guy Dupuy is what I would call the "Perfect Dunker"... He doesn't miss, can do every dunk off of 1 or 2 feet... Here's Guy's "Perfect Dunk" where he takes the ball out of the hand and takes it BEHIND HIS BACK while Jumping over a 6'1" Person and does not touch them... at all... Guy had 7 more perfect dunks during this show at the University of Florida, mix will be following.
You can get the T-Shirt Guy is wearing here http://www.teamflightbrothers.spreadshirt.com
